\section{Introduction}

The {\Tt{}netout{\_}mex\nwendquote} module provides Matlab interfaces to
the netlist output routines.


\section{Interface}

\nwfilename{netout-mex.nw}\nwbegincode{1}\sublabel{NW3vTA7A-3fxJec-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-3fxJec-1}}}\moddef{netout-mex.h~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-3fxJec-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
#ifndef NETOUT_MEX_H
#define NETOUT_MEX_H

#include <mex.h>
#include <netout.h>

void netout_mex_register();
int  netout_mex_tag();

netout_t* mx_to_netout(const mxArray* array);

#endif /* NETOUT_MEX_H */
\nwnotused{netout-mex.h}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{2}\nwdocspar

\subsection{Netout data structures}

static int netout_handle_tag;

\nwused{\\{NW3vTA7A-1e4DT0-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{6}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{7}\sublabel{NW3vTA7A-nRuDO-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-nRuDO-1}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-nRuDO-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3vTA7A-1e4DT0-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{\relax}{NW3vTA7A-nRuDO-2}\nwenddeflinemarkup

\{
    netout_handle_tag = mex_handle_new_tag();
    \LA{}register mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-Ye2uh-1}}\RA{}
\}

int netout_mex_tag()
\{
    return netout_handle_tag;
\}

\subsection{Conversion functions}

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{11}\sublabel{NW3vTA7A-nRuDO-3}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-nRuDO-3}}}\moddef{functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-nRuDO-1}}}\plusendmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3vTA7A-1e4DT0-1}}\nwprevnextdefs{NW3vTA7A-nRuDO-2}{\relax}\nwenddeflinemarkup
netout_t* mx_to_netout(const mxArray* array)
\{
    return mx_to_handle(array, netout_handle_tag, "Invalid netout handle");
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3vTA7A-1e4DT0-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{12}\nwdocspar


\subsection{{\Tt{}netout\nwendquote} command}

The {\Tt{}netout(netout,\ name,\ data)\nwendquote} command adds parameters to the netlist.

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{13}\sublabel{NW3vTA7A-2yJWyC-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-2yJWyC-1}}}\moddef{cho-netout.m~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-2yJWyC-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwenddeflinemarkup
function cho_netout(handle, name, data)
sugarmex('netout', handle, name, data);
\nwnotused{cho-netout.m}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{14}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{15}\sublabel{NW3vTA7A-Ye2uh-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-Ye2uh-1}}}\moddef{register mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-Ye2uh-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3vTA7A-nRuDO-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
mexmgr_add("netout", netout);
\nwused{\\{NW3vTA7A-nRuDO-1}}\nwendcode{}\nwbegindocs{16}\nwdocspar

\nwenddocs{}\nwbegincode{17}\sublabel{NW3vTA7A-3MtIgE-1}\nwmargintag{{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-3MtIgE-1}}}\moddef{mex functions~{\nwtagstyle{}\subpageref{NW3vTA7A-3MtIgE-1}}}\endmoddef\nwstartdeflinemarkup\nwusesondefline{\\{NW3vTA7A-1e4DT0-1}}\nwenddeflinemarkup
static void netout(int nlhs, mxArray* plhs[],
                   int nrhs, const mxArray* prhs[])
\{
    netout_t*   netout;
    const char* name;

    mex_check_num_args(nrhs, 3);
    netout = mx_to_netout(prhs[0]);
    name   = mx_to_string(prhs[1]);

    if (mxIsChar(prhs[2]))
        netout_string(netout, name, mx_to_string(prhs[2]));
    else if (mxIsNumeric(prhs[2]))
        netout_double_matrix(netout, name, mxGetPr(prhs[2]), 
                             mxGetM(prhs[2]), mxGetN(prhs[2]));
    else \{
/*        mexErrMsgTxt("Cannot output a non-string and non-number type\\n");*/
netout_string(netout, name, "***");
    \}
\}

\nwused{\\{NW3vTA7A-1e4DT0-1}}\nwendcode{}
